text:
When using Jlink/mergefiles to merge two jars, excluded files are included in 
the outfile.

<jlink outfile="out.jar">
  <mergefiles>
    <fileset dir=".">
      <include name="jar1.jar"/>
      <include name="jar2.jar"/>
      <exclude name="com/sun/**/*"/>   <-- ignored
    </fileset>
  </mergefiles>
</jlink>
creator: davidr@goodserver.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
<jlink> is deprecated in 1.5, please use <jar> with <zipfileset>s and
<zipgroupfileset>s.
